scripts.release-mac: yarn build && yarn rebuild && npm_config_electron_mirror=https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ npm_config_electron_custom_dir=8.0.0 DEBUG=* electron-packager ./ --platform=mas --arch=x64 --electron-version=8.0.0 --out=./release --overwrite --ignore="(.git|yarn.lock|tsconfig.json)" --ignore=^/src --ignore=^/client --icon=icon.icns
scripts.release-win: yarn build && yarn rebuild && npm_config_electron_mirror=https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ npm_config_electron_custom_dir=8.0.0 DEBUG=* electron-packager ./ --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --electron-version=8.0.0 --out=./release --version-string.CompanyName=PEFISH --overwrite --ignore="(.git|yarn.lock|tsconfig.json)" --ignore=^/src --ignore=^/client --icon=icon.ico
